mapper.select: SELECT password FROM users WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT r.room_id, r.room_title, COUNT(rp.user_id) AS user_count, MAX(u.avatar) AS avatar, MAX(u.nickname) AS user_nickname FROM room r LEFT JOIN room_part rp ON r.room_id = rp.room_id LEFT JOIN users u ON rp.user_id = u.id GROUP BY r.room_id, r.room_title
